mapper.select: select id, qgongsi, bumen, qbianhao, qname, qnamehao, address, a01sm, a02sm, a03sm, a04sm, a05sm, a06sm, a07sm, a08sm, a09sm, a10sm from qizhe_address where qname = #{qname}
